div.ab: This one, moistened & well beaten & kneaded as you know, is necessary for you to make the contour for containing your molds. But take heed that it is not too soft, but rather as if half dry, that ilit does not attach to your hands, because otherwise it would attach to your work. Always keep it in a humid place, and make holes in it, and fill them with water to keep it fresh.
The gray one is best, which does not crack at all.
It is more appropriate than a blade of lead.
